paragraph.intro: Your safety and our safety is our highest priority. Operating heavy machinery, transporting goods from one location to the next, ... . Follow the appropriate course below to get certified.
We aim to improve wherever possible. Feel free to reach out to us if you have questions or remarks.

Contact1.title: Health & safety
Contact1.intro: You've noticed a dangerous situation on site? Want to know more about the e-learning tool? Suggest an improvement?

Contact2.title: IT Support
Contact2.intro: Something on the website did't work? Computer problems?
